text:
January 16, 1961
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
1015 West Church Street
Champaign, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Yes, indeed, we’ll be happy to get you a room,
cover your expenses for the additional days
you are here, and welcome you back to Washington.
Unfortunately, it appears unlikely that 1*11
be able to be here during much of your stay as
I’m scheduled to give a speech in Salt Lake
City the morning of the 23rd and afternoon of
the 24th. However, I ought to be back by
Saturday evening, the 25th.
In the meantime Cam will take you in tow and
fill you in on what’s doing in the international
area and Mcllvane-Bronson-Press & Co. can des¬
cribe other activities.
We’ll have a congressman burning in the window
to welcome you.
Cordially,
William G. Harley
WGHimem
cc: Miss Camille Henderson
